website_summaries.verdict: A simple design that works. This seatbelt-style strap is as comfortable as it is strong.
pros: Can be used as a shoulder strap, neck strap or sling
cons: Users recommend storing it in your camera bag's exterior pocket to avoid damaging camera

customer_reviews.title: Awesome strap, clever connectors and very soft seat belt ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome strap, clever connectors and very soft seat belt material for the strap. My only gripe is with the metal adjusters. When I put my camera in my sling and stuff the strap in with it, the strap adjusters scratch the camera. Would have been better with a rubberized coating on them or maybe velcro tabs to cover them. Love the strength and industrial look of the quick adjusters so a love/hate situation for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable with a heavy camera set up.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable strap I have ever used. I am a woman, 5'4" and my Nikon d7000 with a battery grip weighs a ton. With other straps, it was always digging into my neck or shoulders. This strap is wider but never digs in. I love the different ways I can configure the attachment to the camera, too. When I bring the camera to my face in the vertical position, I no longer have the strap dangling over the shutter or viewfinder. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Angelroost

customer_reviews.title: It just works
customer_reviews.text: It hard to explain something like this; It just works. The strap is very comfortable, I wore it for two weeks straight, 9+ hours days, holding a full frame camera and 24-70 2.8 lens. No back pain, no shoulder pain. The reason for this is how the strap holds the camera when not in use. The quick release tab that hold the strap are big plus. Overall someone put a lot of good through and design in to this product, and it show.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Castone

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but poor execution
customer_reviews.text: Im not sure if my strap is defective or if its just like this but the locking mechanism does virtually nothing to keep the strap in place. It slides to full extention all on its own despite being "locked" in place. I am constantly readjusting it to my preferred length only to have it slide to full length minutes later. The "grip" has already started peeling at the top of the strap and I have only had this for a week. Looks very nice overall but the gimmick slide mechanism they are selling you on is not as functional as you are lead to believe.
customer_reviews.author: ReadyPlayerOne

customer_reviews.title: This is a great strap and I intend on updating this review with ...
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to Calumet for the quick delivery! This is a great strap and I intend on updating this review with more thorough details after my trip. So far, love the color and the quality of the strap itself. The locking mechanism had me worrying as I read a blog where the writer mentioned that it failed and he dropped his camera as a result. However, I feel that it's a solid mechanism if you make sure the clips engage. That being said, we'll see how it fares in Japan over the next two weeks! Stay tuned!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Keith

customer_reviews.title: The Cadillac of camera straps!
customer_reviews.text: This Peak Design Summit Camera strap is LOVELY! It looks great! (I bought the RED!) Feels great! Adjusts EASILY in seconds to snap a photo then readjusts so you can return to your hike, or the snaps instantly pop free to do whatever you else one may like. The strap Sony sent with y new HX400V was pathetic (be ashamed Sony!) but this Peak Design is a gem! A first rate camera deserves such a fine strap - buy it! -- Jack in Western/CO
customer_reviews.author: John P. Delmore

customer_reviews.title: Great strap, only one problem
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera strap. Strong and durable. I’ve travelled everywhere carrying my camera on this. My only concern is the rubber strip that is suppose to keep it from slipping seems to be melting off. Not sure why this would happen. Seems to be a design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Dosa

customer_reviews.title: It's "Okay"
customer_reviews.text: This is just meh IMO. It looks nice, feels good, and has good functionality, but mine slips virtually all the time, so I need to just get used to having it be fully extended with my camera. Though I will admit, my kit is kind of heavy, I did not expect it to slip like there was no resistance.
customer_reviews.author: JoelTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great strap for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Olympus EM-1 Mark II and am really happy with how I can sling it across my neck and shoulder and let it rest on my hip as i walk along, then quickly bring my camera up to my face. I shoot a lot of birds and wildlife and needed a strap that held securely and yet didn't get in my way when I needed to shoot. And an added bonus: it's very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Strap!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best strap from the ones I've used so far. Very good way of handling your camera. I liked the click system where you can easily attach or detach the camera from strap, very useful while packing the camera in the bag - since the strap is long and also when you put the camera on tripod without strap results in less vibrations for long exposure since there is no strap which is hanging and waving around. Quality of this strap is also amazing, overall I would highly recommend this strap.
customer_reviews.author: Chirag Khatri

customer_reviews.title: The Peak Design Slide is amazing, it's comfy even with a Mark III and ...
customer_reviews.text: I seriously can't say enough about this strap. I previously used a Black Rapid, but my MarkIII fell off of it TWICE. So I went searching for a replacement. The Peak Design Slide is amazing, it's comfy even with a Mark III and 70-200mm on it, and this color is super sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Super Nice Camera Strap!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome camera strap. It is extremely, impressively well made. Looks sharp. It includes an arca compatible bottom plate which allows you to optionally use the strap in 3 different carrying positions; neck, shoulder, or sling. Much nicer than the US Strap I've had and used or the camera provided strap. I will likely get a second one for my other camera. I recommend it to anyone looking for a nice and high quality camera strap.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: very well built
customer_reviews.text: Great design. Looks durable, holds tight and looks stylish with a black camera like my xt3. I needed a strap like this because I recently added a battery grip and that added some weight. The middle of the strap where your shoulder sits has a pad integrated into the strap. It also has grip on one side of said area so you can flip the strap around for added grip. The padded area is slightly stiff but I believe that because it’s brand new and needs to be worn in and seasoned to me. This a really well build strap.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick B.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! You will not regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly why arent ther more quick release camera straps. This is by far one of the best strap I have ever bought. The quick release function is great when Im on the run for a video shoot and dont want the annoyance of the strap dangling in my way constantly. The easy adjustment for length feature is incredibly easy. If I want to change my strap in a sling I can do it in literally less than 15 seconds! Definitely worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Best strap ever!
customer_reviews.text: I like the flexibility of using it not using it. I switch between the PD clutch and this strap depending on the type Of shoot I’m in. The PD attachment systems make this so easy. I also like the very flexible strap length adjustment which is a great to have when walking or doing street photography. It’s nice that PD has gotten out of its gray and black color options too.
customer_reviews.author: RMA

customer_reviews.title: A strapping young strap
customer_reviews.text: Really like this strap. It’s simple, easy, and intuitive. Feels very secure, and the clip system is convenient. Loving not having to fight with my camera strap all the time. I can just unsnap it. Very nice packaging as well. Did find it odd the box for strap was opened upon arrival. Nothing damaged or missing though so no harm done.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my new strap its is wonderful you can wear ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new strap its is wonderful you can wear in 3 different ways over the shoulder, across the body or around the neck. I love the seat belt like lever that adjusts the length of the strap on a fly. and it supports my camera I never feel unsecure with this strap it is now my new baby! Minor irritation is the strap sometimesss gets tangled around in the adjustment lever But Ultimately I love this strap
customer_reviews.author: britne

customer_reviews.title: The most beautiful and comfortable camera strap
customer_reviews.text: I love the aesthetics of this camera strap, as well as the outstanding craftsmanship. The fact it can be worn as a neck strap or a shoulder strap is a plus also. Conversion to either is both quick and easy. I love this strap so much, I purchased 4 more for my other cameras.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and looks very nice
customer_reviews.text: As a professional photographer I can attest to the comfort of this strap after hours and hours of use. Long days of shooting while wearing my camera(s) is proof that this Peak Design camera strap has both comfort and style. I wish they would make a dual camera strap!
customer_reviews.author: TriscuitO

customer_reviews.title: Not good for cross-body sling
customer_reviews.text: It would be great if it was contoured like the Black Rapid strap. As is, it isn't very comfortable to sling across your body. So, it ends up being just slightly better than the neck strap that comes with a camera. The best features are the strap material, the novel length adjusters and the quick release buttons. It's a start.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great strap, you pay for what you get!
customer_reviews.text: I got this strap for my Sony a6500 and I love it! The seat belt material is very comfortable and it attaches to the camera so easily, I've yet to really take it out for a long day of shooting but I don't have any fears that it won't be comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jhunt19

customer_reviews.title: Like it overall, but slips off my shoulder easily
customer_reviews.text: The look of the strap, the red color and the build quality are excellent. I like the quick release part where I can have two sets of anchors connected to two of my primary cameras. However, I am having an issue with it sliding off my left shoulder quite easily. I don't know if it's due to the weight of my gear - 1DX MKii with 100-400mm lens attached. Am I missing a way to keep it on my shoulder?
customer_reviews.author: SOAK

customer_reviews.title: Good but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Well built with some innovative features but still overpriced. For the price I would like to see the clips that clip from the camera to the strap to be made with stronger material and the clip itself to be steel instead of plastic. Other than the price, this is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: W. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: This is the best camera strap ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best camera strap ever. I have hiked hundreds of miles with my 5d mk iii around my neck. This strap has saved me. I want to recommend this to everyone that I see out there with their stupid stock straps.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Cramer

customer_reviews.title: beautifully constructed, and the color (red) doesn't hurt either
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the quality of this product; beautifully constructed, and the color (red) doesn't hurt either. I will be using the camera with the new strap all next week, do not foresee any issues at all
customer_reviews.author: susan dicriscio

customer_reviews.title: Better camera strap I ever had
customer_reviews.text: Better camera strap I ever had. It is a little big for my mirrorless camera. But it feels very good in your body. It is very comfortable. And it is very easy to adjust. Besides, it is quite pretty, has a very good build quality, and I fell my camera very safe with it.
customer_reviews.author: KyllerCG

customer_reviews.title: Peak Design...Love Everything They Make
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about Peak Designs products. It's as if they're in my head, anything that I am looking for in camera accessories/products they have bought to life. BUY Peak Design, the 99% of you will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Rivera, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: The darn thing kept slipping off my shoulder and was uncomfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Strap's rubber imprints melted after 2 months of use
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, the seat belt material and the aluminum quick-adjuster handles as well as their quick release system is awesome, but the rubber imprints that sit in one side of the strap started to melt after a couple of months of use and now are almost all gone. I'm a wedding photographer which means continued use of the camera for periods longer than 8 hours, the strap is comfortable but the melted rubber turned up on my skin, clothes and the strap itself that now looks gross. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful, works perfectly and is very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful, works perfectly and is very convenient. I like the hook it has and the waybyou can adjust the length of the chord. I saw it on a tourist and now I'm very happy to have my own! Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! This strap is by far the most versatile that I have ever owned. I am able to quickly move it between cameras using the anchor links which you can purchase separately if you need more. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Reese

customer_reviews.title: Awesome accessory!
customer_reviews.text: High quality camera strap that does everything you expect, very well. I substituted a better quick release plate, one that has pins to prevent the camera from sliding off. Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: KS56

customer_reviews.title: well made and good parts.
customer_reviews.text: The only caveat I wish is that it could be maybe 2 inches longer because I have a big torso but I understand that majority of people that use this might not need that.
customer_reviews.author: Large Lau

customer_reviews.title: My first impression was that it's amazing piece of gear
customer_reviews.text: My first impression was that it's amazing piece of gear, but over time - it's just an expensive strap... Rope attachments anchors tend to twist a lot and the metal elements are just a perfect tool to scratch your camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jacek

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing! I have had many straps over the years
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! I have had many straps over the years, but the versitility and comfort of this system blows everything else out of the water. Build quality is great. My only gripe is that it does not balance a larger camera (Sony A99 or Minolta A9) with a short lens (50 1.7 for example) very well. It isn't unusable, but not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder strap damages shirts!
customer_reviews.text: The black rubber used on the strap to help hold it on the shoulder started rubbing off onto my shirts and was nearly impossible to.wash out. I am hoping this strap works better!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Krausmann

customer_reviews.title: The perfect strap? This could very well be it
customer_reviews.text: The perfect strap? This could very well be it. Very nice material, easily adjustable length (actually!), and comes with enough connector tabs for two cameras. Really like it, and the red color is fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Flight Creative Media

customer_reviews.title: Yas
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for a couple of weeks but I already really like it. Way better than the basic strap that comes with any camera and it doesn’t scream that you have a super expensive camera either.
customer_reviews.author: Darren VanCuren

customer_reviews.title: Best DSLR strap for outdoor trekking.
customer_reviews.text: Best strap for heavier dslr's your packing all day. Very comfortable and welk designed, easy to adjust on the fly.
customer_reviews.author: F L A S H

customer_reviews.title: This one is too bulky for easy use. Definitely not worth
customer_reviews.text: I'd just wear the one that came with your camera. This one is too bulky for easy use. Definitely not worth $65
customer_reviews.author: Zrock02

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I like the bulkiness of this. Shooting video and photos feels great. Plus it looks awesome. I almost went with the thinner models but I'm glad I got the slide.
customer_reviews.author: Jered Mckenna

customer_reviews.title: Peak Design DSLR strap.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. Works great and matches with my Sony A7RIII. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Really nice strap and love the connection buttons
customer_reviews.text: Really nice strap and love the connection buttons. Only wish the strap was a bit more flexible - but then the slide probably wouldn't work as nicely as it does.
customer_reviews.author: computerguy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable strap. The for anchors provide enough flexibility to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable strap. The for anchors provide enough flexibility to have your camera hang in a position that is natural to grab. For those wondering about the color, the first and second photos are spot on, the others make it seem more dull than it really is, it is still not as bright as some YouTube videos show.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitriy Shendel

customer_reviews.title: the strap is nice, however the cushion part
customer_reviews.text: the strap is nice, however the cushion part, after folding it to put in the bag it kind of broke where was folded. now it just has a broken part but I don't see any other way you can put in the pouch unless you fold it. wish it didn't have the cushion/pad but i guess I'll leave with it.
customer_reviews.author: muzika4life

customer_reviews.title: User-friendly strap
customer_reviews.text: Although it is a high-quality camera strap, because of its high quality, it is used for shoulder bags without limiting its use to cameras. In addition to the goodness of design, the product of peak design is really wonderful. We recommend.
customer_reviews.author: m.nagayama

customer_reviews.title: This on its own is already amazing though. Really easily adjustable as well
customer_reviews.text: Looks really slick and the lock system is really really convenient. Just ordered a peak design Shell to go with this for my a7 rii, hoping that works out well. This on its own is already amazing though. Really easily adjustable as well. Love the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Crono144

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Aesthetic Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent strap quality and aesthetics. The quick detach mounts are ideal if you switch between using a strap and just holding your camera free. Adjustable buckle works very smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Strap is well constructed and comfortable to wear. Being able to distribute the weight of the camera to different positions is a plus. The connection points/disks seem to get in the way. Over all like the strap and would recommend this strap to others.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: excellent craftsmanship & material quality
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed; excellent craftsmanship & material quality; looks very stylish and handsome with a Sony a7RII attached to it!!
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: I love it, extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love it, extremely comfortable. I just had shoulder surgery and this allows me to use my camera while rehabbing. Way more comfortable than the Nikon strap.
customer_reviews.author: james rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Quick Change Artist
customer_reviews.text: I had one of their earlier model straps but I recently bought a big zoom lens that needed a wider more padded strap. I love the fact that it's so easy to take it on and off the camera. I use a tripod a lot and don't want the strap on the camera then. I also like the length as I wear it over my shoulder down at my hip like a sling.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: This product is pretty amazing. Holds a full frame camera and a ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty amazing. Holds a full frame camera and a heavy 2.8 zoom lens on you shoulder like it weighs nothing and its stylish too. I highly recommend it if youre doing any event or travel photography.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Castelhano

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he absolutely loves it! The only reason it doesn't get five stars is because it is not as vibrant a red as the pictures indicated. Otherwise, it is exactly what he wanted.
customer_reviews.author: LIfelong Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Best one that I’ve owned yet! Makes me feel super comfortable letting my camera hang by my side!
customer_reviews.author: Smooth

customer_reviews.title: Quality is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable to carry my heavy Sony A7R iii attached with a 24-70mm GM lens with this strap! it is extremely easy to snap the clips on and off and optimal use. I am glad I made this purchase and I love the fancy color!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this was not long as I needed but I well keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Doty

customer_reviews.title: Nonslip stripe is on the wrong side
customer_reviews.text: The rubberized non slip stripes are on the wrong side of the strap :/ Also the metal buckle can stratch the camera easily
customer_reviews.author: J. Warburton

customer_reviews.title: 5 STAR
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Peak Design and I will always be one. Great product and great quality as always!
customer_reviews.author: Nenad Spasojevic

customer_reviews.title: Thoughtfully designed Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: Quality quality qulity! Thoughtfully designed with highest quality material! If money is not the problem just get it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best strap you can get. Doesn't dig, and quick to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: FikeMernandez

customer_reviews.title: which is fine with me
customer_reviews.text: The length of the strap needs to be fully extended, which is fine with me, I am 6'2". I love the seatbelt material used as it is very strong and it allows for the strap to slide easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love everything Peak Design makes
customer_reviews.text: I love everything Peak Design makes. This item is no exception. Great quality, easy to use and looks great too! If you don't already own a Peak Design gear stop buying other stuff and just get Peak!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera strap system
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera strap system. Only thing for me is it is a bit too long but that is because I am vertically challenged. Great Product!!
customer_reviews.author: Dogzma

customer_reviews.title: looks great. I trust it with my heavy SLR (6D ...
customer_reviews.text: This strap is solid, looks great. I trust it with my heavy SLR (6D with 70-200 Tamron heavy lens)
customer_reviews.author: Yuro

customer_reviews.title: Love this strap as well as the anchor system
customer_reviews.text: Love this strap as well as the anchor system. I use it on my Nikon D750 and so far no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have a new found love in Peak Design
customer_reviews.text: I have a new found love in Peak Design. This strap is very comfortable and works so well with the entire PD system.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic strap! I love all the different positions you ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic strap! I love all the different positions you can put it in they really come in handy when you're shooting different things.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Recommendation
customer_reviews.text: Excellent strap which exactly fits my needs. The same feeling as a seat belt (neatly woven), and the color is nice. There is a padding added in the middle which suppose to make it more comfortable to wear it (doesn’t effect much).
customer_reviews.author: Ohad Stern

customer_reviews.title: Excellent produit.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. The colour is also beautiful. I already had it in blue, I wanted it in red. Hight quality of peak design
customer_reviews.author: Leeloo20oo

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch
customer_reviews.text: This an excellent product for a photographer. It holds the camera securely and comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Marical2

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful strap and design.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Peak Design strap I have purchased. I love the color and design but the padded portion of this strap is much more stiff than the original strap. I like the more flexible padding of the original. Edit: I have since purchased the Slide Lite as well. It is thinner and a nice strap but I still like the original strap the best of the 3. I have them on my D750s and on a F100 film camera.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality
customer_reviews.text: Looked at other similar straps and all the reviews and nothing compared to this one. My partner is over the moon with it
customer_reviews.author: Nicola Towers

customer_reviews.title: Peak Design has come up with a great product line here
customer_reviews.text: Peak Design has come up with a great product line here. This strap makes my camera feel almost weightless and is easy to swap with the wrist strap that I also bought from them.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and beautiful strap!
customer_reviews.text: Love this strap, got nothing to add besides the red also happens to fit nicely to my Sony a7r III lens mount color.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Yavets

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I love the color. It feels very durable and it makes me feel good knowing my camera is safe.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Moskwa

customer_reviews.title: The only strap you'll need.
customer_reviews.text: Gave all my other camera straps away, this is the best of the best!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Prince Fishler

customer_reviews.title: Highest quality strap system for my camera.
customer_reviews.text: Great strap and the color gets a lot of attention from fellow photographers when out at shoots.
customer_reviews.author: R. Derrick Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great. Very wide
customer_reviews.text: High quality. Great. Very wide. They make a narrower one for smaller cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Frank H. Wu

customer_reviews.title: Strong, comfortable, functional!
customer_reviews.text: Love this strap. Mega sturdy and very different to the run of the mill straps!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Stephen Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love using this camera strap as a crossbody. Helpful to carry my DSLR with heavier lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Kim H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, nice function, nice color ! I am completely satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Koki Ogino

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very happy ! Much better then everything I ever had ! Perfect and looks great too !
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Best strap hands down!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this strap, very well made and the snap in piece is excellent. Easily adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Andre J.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Last minute purchase for an overseas trip. Well worth the money if you don't have a strap like this. Loved it.
customer_reviews.author: PVL

customer_reviews.title: Peak Design is the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I love Peak Design!! The quality of their products is so amazing! Every photography needs a Slide Camera Strap. It is a game changer!
customer_reviews.author: Jettylou

customer_reviews.title: High quality as always!
customer_reviews.text: A perfect product from PeakDesign, as all other products from them!
customer_reviews.author: Patrik Forster

customer_reviews.title: Get it a must have
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this thing well built and is comfortable to carry
customer_reviews.author: Rick McCulley

customer_reviews.title: The best camera strap on the market
customer_reviews.text: The best camera strap on the market. Check out their Everyday Messenger Camera Bag. I love it and now i always have my camera with me. My Uncle once told me that if you don't have your camera with you your not a photographer :)
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P. Mcclain

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised on the web site, worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Smith-House

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the neck strap. It's as tough as car seat belt
customer_reviews.author: C. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade over the Black Rapid but.....
customer_reviews.text: Upgrade over the Black Rapid but not without faults. I love how smooth this strap works and more importantly on how motionless it holds the camera at your side. The BR and OpTech straps allow the camera to bounce on your side with every step you take and every move you make :) Its only drawback IMO is that the padded strap area will move up your shoulder and rub on your neck.Which gets old on longer events. Even with that fault I still feels it's the best camera strap I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: I love this strap
customer_reviews.text: I love this strap! I will be buying more peak design stuff based on the quality of this strap! Quick release functions flawlessly
customer_reviews.author: Stacy F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera Strap/Sling!
customer_reviews.text: This product was completely sold out in the Netherlands (that’s where I am from), so happy that I could buy it here! Great product, great materials! So happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: RGH

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this strap. Perfect for walking around town and shooting. Feels very well made and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Aleman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this strap so much I convinced 2 of my other friends to get one. DOPE PRODUCT!

customer_reviews.title: Father's Day Gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a Father's Day gift and he absolutely loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Santiago

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable design, efficient while on the job, and it is made with amazing quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived yesterday. This strap is absolutely perfect for me. I've been searching for a strap like this for a couple of years now and can't understand how I could have missed this product. The quality and design are absolutely in line with my way of thinking -- it's perfect! I can't thank Peak Design enough for putting together something like this.
customer_reviews.author: Mel C. Labrador

customer_reviews.title: Great strap, but internal padding messed up
customer_reviews.text: Great strap overall. Nice hardware makes it easy to adjust; very aesthetically pleasing; and it does slide well, allowing you to move the camera around without struggle. I haven't needed to use the sticky side to secure the strap, but I think if I need to secure the camera, I'll use other means; Capture, probably I was disappointed that when leaving the strap hanging on a chair overnight, the internal padding separated where the strap was bent. Now the strap has a thin section in the middle of the padded area that folds easily, changing the way it lies over my shoulder. It's not uncomfortable, but it *is* annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsay  Strates

product_meta.title: Peak Design Slide Summit Edition Lassen Padded Camera Strap, Red
feature_bullets: 2 durable aluminum quick-pull adjuster handles allow a huge range of length adjustment.
Wear as a sling strap, shoulder strap or neck strap. Reconfigure in seconds.
Anchors easily hold 200 lbs (90 kg). The camera strap works with heaviest pro cameras or binoculars.
Ultra-smooth nylon webbing reconfigures to neck, shoulder, or sling carry style in seconds.
This Peak Design strap is under a lifetime warranty: guaranteed.
